descriptions.theones: Mobile application for the sale of luxury products
descriptions.otello: Platform that puts administrative bodies and hotels in touch with each other in order to place single people who have run out of accommodation.
descriptions.eatsalad: Platform for composing, ordering and delivering customised salads
descriptions.exval: Real estate transaction research and analysis platform
descriptions.tradelock: Platform that allows companies to insure their invoices
descriptions.treasurehunters: Mobile game that lets you search for treasure in AR through quests and objects.
